entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
